mapper.select: select records_id, machine_id, machine_name, machine_type_id, employee_id, repaire_employees_name, fault_description, method_description, maintenance_time, urgency_level, record_type, start_time, end_time, records_state from records where records_id = #{recordsId}
mapper.insert: insert into records(machine_id, machine_name, machine_type_id, employee_id, repaire_employees_name, fault_description, method_description, maintenance_time, urgency_level, record_type, start_time, end_time, records_state) values (#{machineId}, #{machineName}, #{machineTypeId}, #{employeeId}, #{repaireEmployeesName}, #{faultDescription}, #{methodDescription}, #{maintenanceTime}, #{urgencyLevel}, #{recordType}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{recordsState})

insert into records(machine_id, machine_name, machine_type_id, employee_id, repaire_employees_name, fault_description, method_description, maintenance_time, urgency_level, record_type, start_time, end_time, records_state) values
(#{entity.machineId}, #{entity.machineName}, #{entity.machineTypeId}, #{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.repaireEmployeesName}, #{entity.faultDescription}, #{entity.methodDescription}, #{entity.maintenanceTime}, #{entity.urgencyLevel}, #{entity.recordType}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.recordsState})

insert into records(machine_id, machine_name, machine_type_id, employee_id, repaire_employees_name, fault_description, method_description, maintenance_time, urgency_level, record_type, start_time, end_time, records_state) values
(#{entity.machineId}, #{entity.machineName}, #{entity.machineTypeId}, #{entity.employeeId}, #{entity.repaireEmployeesName}, #{entity.faultDescription}, #{entity.methodDescription}, #{entity.maintenanceTime}, #{entity.urgencyLevel}, #{entity.recordType}, #{entity.startTime}, #{entity.endTime}, #{entity.recordsState})
on duplicate key update machine_id = values(machine_id), machine_name = values(machine_name), machine_type_id = values(machine_type_id), employee_id = values(employee_id), repaire_employees_name = values(repaire_employees_name), fault_description = values(fault_description), method_description = values(method_description), maintenance_time = values(maintenance_time), urgency_level = values(urgency_level), record_type = values(record_type), start_time = values(start_time), end_time = values(end_time), records_state = values(records_state)
mapper.update:
update records
machine_id = #{machineId},
machine_name = #{machineName},
machine_type_id = #{machineTypeId},
employee_id = #{employeeId},
repaire_employees_name = #{repaireEmployeesName},
fault_description = #{faultDescription},
method_description = #{methodDescription},
maintenance_time = #{maintenanceTime},
urgency_level = #{urgencyLevel},
record_type = #{recordType},
start_time = #{startTime},
end_time = #{endTime},
records_state = #{recordsState},
where records_id = #{recordsId}
